entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 09:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: SW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12 except minus 17 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12 except minus 17 inland. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
